hero.title: OOH Media Specialist
hero.subtitle: Transforming the ordinary into extraordinary. One OOH campaign at a time.

about.heading: About
about.p1: I'm an advertising professional with over 15 years dedicated to OOH media. I've worked at agencies like VML and Galeria, leading national campaigns for brands like VIVO, and also at media companies like Eletromidia and Kallas. At planning agency LATCOM, I worked on international projects for Disney, ESPN and Spotify.
about.p2: I believe the street is much more than a display point – it's a disputed territory where outdoor media needs to be planned with intelligence, sensitivity and intention.
about.p3: I have one foot in creativity and another in strategy. I know the tools, the numbers and the maps – but I also walk the streets.
about.quote: I seek to connect brands to real contexts. And more than media, create presence.
about.author: Jefferson Mendes

footer.cta: Estou sempre aberto para discutir projetos, trocar ideias sobre o futuro da mídia OOH ou simplesmente conversar sobre como podemos transformar espaços urbanos em oportunidades.
